column1: 89631139$Blue-Eyes White Dragon$$LIGHT$[Dragon/normal]$$$$$8$3000$2500$$$$This legendary dragon is a powerful engine of destruction. Virtually invincible
column2: very few have faced this awesome creature and lived to tell the tale.$$$$$

column1: 95132338$Aqua Chorus$$TRAP$$$$$$$$$Continuous$$$If there are monsters with the same name on the field
column2: increase the ATK and DEF of all of those monsters with the same name by 500 points.$$$$$

column1: 97809599$Seal of the Ancients$$SPELL$$$$$$$$$Normal$$$Pay 1000 Life Points. Pick up and see all face-down cards on your opponent's side of the field
column2: then return them to their original positions. (The effects of the face-down cards are not activated.)$$$$$
